title: Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description**

 Grantify is an innovative education platform that bridges students and universities through a transparent admissions and tuition\\-matching system. By aligning students' financial and academic goals with universities' needs, Grantify creates an efficient and equitable pathway to higher education. The platform simplifies the decision\\-making process, broadens access for students, and helps universities connect with qualified applicants more effectively. Our mission is to make higher education more accessible, affordable, and tailored to the evolving needs of students.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Software Engineer. The Software Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable back\\-end systems and software solutions. Daily tasks include programming, implementing object\\-oriented principles, participating in code reviews, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and ensuring the performance and reliability of technical systems. The role involves working in a dynamic and collaborative environment to deliver high\\-quality code while adhering to project timelines.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Computer Science fundamentals and problem\\-solving skills
* Expertise in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Strong knowledge of Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts
* Ability to work with diverse teams and adopt modern development practices
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
* Experience in the higher education or technology industry is a plus

* Familiarity with the full SDLC and agile methodologies.

title: ETL Developer
description:
Summary We are looking for highly skilled Data Engineers with 3 to 5 years of experience in building and managing advanced data solutions. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience with SQL, Ab\\-Initio, Teradata and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
 



**Key Responsibilities** 




 Be the part of the team towards design, development, and optimization of large\\-scale data pipelines, ensuring they meet business and technical requirements.
 



 ï‚· Implement data solutions using SQL, Ab\\-Initio, Teradata and GCP; ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance. ï‚· Mentor and guide the colleagues in the development and execution of ETL processes and data integration solutions.
 



 ï‚· Take ownership of end\\-to\\-end data workflows, from data ingestion to transformation, storage, and accessibility.
 



 ï‚· Lead performance tuning and optimization efforts for complex SQL queries and Teradata database systems.
 



 ï‚· Design and implement data governance, quality, and security best practices to ensure data integrity and compliance.
 



 ï‚· Manage the migration of legacy data systems to cloud\\-based solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
 



 ï‚· Ensure continuous improvement and automation of data pipelines and workflows. ï‚· Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data quality, pipeline performance, and system integration.
 



 ï‚· Stay up\\-to\\-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to drive innovation and improve data engineering practices within the team.
 



**Required Skills** 




 ï‚· 4 to 6 years of experience in data engineering or related roles.
 



 ï‚· Strong expertise in SQL, Teradata, and Ab\\-Initio.
 



 ï‚· Proficient and good hands on experience in using the Ab\\-Initio development products \\- GDE, Conduct\\>IT, Control Center, Continuous Flows, EME, M\\-HUB, etc.
 



 ï‚· Hands\\-on experience over Unix/Shell scripting.
 



 ï‚· Proficient in scheduling and analyzing jobs using Autosys (or any similar) Scheduler. ï‚· In\\-depth experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including tools like BigQuery, Cloud Storage, Dataflow, etc.
 



 ï‚· Proven track record of leading teams and projects related to data engineering and ETL pipeline development.
 



 ï‚· Experience with data warehousing and cloud\\-native storage solutions.
 



 ï‚· Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.

 **Preferred (good to have) Skills**

 ï‚· Familiarity with any other ETL tools like Informatica, Datastage, Alteryx, etc.

title: Data Engineer
description:

**For More Job Updates, Please Follow Our LinkedIn Page (APAC Entrepreneur)**

* Design, build, and maintain data pipelines to collect, store, and process data from various sources.

title: Senior Manager, SW Engineering (11+ years, Java, Spring Boot, Microservices)
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose â€“ to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Visaâ€™s Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the worldâ€™s most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us youâ€™ll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
   

  





 The Opportunity:
   

  





 We are looking for Versatile, curious, and energetic Software Engineers who embrace solving complex challenges on a global scale. As a Visa Software Engineer, you will be an integral part of a multi\\-functional development team inventing, designing, building, and testing software products that reach a truly global customer base. While building components of powerful payment technology, you will get to see your efforts shaping the digital future of monetary transactions.
   

  





 The Work itself:
   

  




* Design code and systems that touch 40% of the world population while influencing Visaâ€™s internal standards for scalability, security, and reusability
* Collaborate multi\\-functionally to create design artifacts and develop best\\-in\\-class software solutions for multiple Visa technical offerings
* Actively contribute to product quality improvements, valuable service technology, and new business flows in diverse agile squads
* Develop robust and scalable products intended for a myriad of customers including end\\-user merchants, b2b, and business to government solutions.
* Leverage innovative technologies to build the next generation of Payment Services, Transaction Platforms, Real\\-Time Payments, and Buy Now Pay Later Technology
* Opportunities to make a difference on a global or local scale through mentorship and continued learning opportunities



 Essential Functions:
   

  




* Works with product owners to gather and refine requirements for one product, adding and taking into account existing tools and solutions across departments.
* Develops and designs moderately advanced architect solutions that are robust and scalable, considering integrations with other solutions across the internal technical ecosystem.
* Provides domain expertise on the development of user documentation of solutions and implements standard processes in user documentation.
* Plays a significant role in the development and delivery of new features within a product from end\\-to\\-end.
* As a Senior Manager in Software Engineering, you will provide technical leadership for one or more product offerings within Value Added Services team. This role extends beyond resource management, development, delivery and you will be required to participate in application architecture, feature design, end to end network topology, application scalability needs and be the owner for bringing up an application from whiteboard to life.
* People: 1\\. Grows team members and builds a high\\-performing team. 2\\. Spends time recruiting and organizing activities that increase retention. 3\\. Creates an environment of psychological safety, enabling team members to thrive. 4\\. Represents the team in the wider engineering and tech organizations.
* Technical: 1\\. Drives the team to decide how to implement our product. 2\\. Spends time driving technical discussions and decisions and writing code. 3\\. Actively guide architecture, tool choices and internal technical quality and best practices. 4\\. Actively raises and drives work to manage tech debt, scalability, performance and maintainability of our software. 5\\. Ensures support and operations for services in production with aid of their team. 6\\. Drives technical excellence.
* Process: 1\\. Continually tunes the team software process to deliver a sustainable and seamless flow of value. 2\\. Managing productivity of the engineers in the team. 3\\. Partnering with product managers in developing short term strategy and roadmap that align with business goals for the initiatives that you would be directly involved in. 4\\. Partnering with remote teams to ensure alignment across product development.



 The Skills You Bring:
   

  




* Energy and Experience: A growth mindset that is curious and passionate about technologies and enjoys challenging projects on a global scale
* Challenge the Status Quo: Comfort in pushing the boundaries, â€˜hackingâ€™ beyond traditional solutions
* Language Expertise: Expertise in one or more general development languages (e.g., Java, C\\#, C\\+\\+)
* Builder: Experience building and deploying modern services and web applications with quality and scalability
* Learner: Constant drive to learn new technologies such as Angular, React, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.
* Partnership: Experience collaborating with Product, Test, Dev\\-ops, and Agile/Scrum teams



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  





  

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications
   

  

 â€¢Minimum of 10\\+ years of experience in application development / engineering using Java backend development with strong proficiency in Java, Spring Boot, JPA, Hibernate and relevant technologies.
   

  

  

  

 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

 â€¢At least 2\\+ years of experience as an Engineering Manager / Tech Lead directly managing a team of Individual Contributors, planning and supporting their career development.
   

  

 â€¢Experience working with Agile process and principles.
   

  

 â€¢Ability to communicate equally effectively with both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
   

  

 â€¢Modern Cloud\\-Native architectures and practices. To name some: high\\-availability, high\\-scalability, microservices, 12\\-factor apps, CI/CD, heavy testing automation and observability.
   

  

 â€¢TDD, BDD and Contract testing.
   

  

 â€¢Proven delivery of well\\-tested, scalable, fault\\-tolerant and performant solutions.
   

  

 â€¢Having worked in a collaborative environment where you are comfortable reviewing code of your peers.
   

  

 â€¢Strong experience in Microservice architecture, Containers Orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker etc.,)
   

  

 â€¢Strong understanding of generative AI models and tools, such as GPT, Llama, and Anthropic etc., and using MCP (Model Context Protocol).
   

  

 â€¢Highly driven, resourceful and results oriented.
   

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

We serve landscaping companies across the United States, Canada, and Australia, helping them streamline their sales, estimation, and site management processes.
 



  





**Our Platform** 




 SiteRecon creates detailed property maps that identify and measure features on commercial propertiesâ€”from turf and parking lots to sidewalks and hard edges.  Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. Define specifications for significant new projects and specify, design and develop software according to those specifications. You will perform professional software development tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.
   

  

**Qualifications**

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 Weâ€™re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. title: Technical Specialist-Testing Services
description:
Area(s) of responsibility
   

  

**Job Description**
**Roles and Responsibilities**
 Understand software requirements specifications to a detailed level
   

  

 Utilize innovative testing technologies to develop test design techniques
   

  

 Prepare test cases for UI, Functionality, Automation, Performance and Security testing
   

  

 Perform manual testing of all application functionality in scope
   

  

 Test the application across commonly used devices and browsers
   

  

 Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts.
   

  

 Creating detailed, comprehensive and well\\-structured test plans and test cases.
   

  

 Analyse and report defects; create test reports, co\\-ordinate with stakeholders
   

  

 Define Quality Metrics and implement measurements to determine test effectiveness, testing efficiency, and measure the overall quality
   

  

 Collaborate with developers on resolution
   

  

 Effective client communication skill

description:

title: Automation Test Lead
description:
Job Title : Automation Test Lead
 



 Job Location : Bengaluru
 



 Exp : 11\\-16 years
 



  





 Position Overview : We are looking for Automation QA Test Lead having good experience in Java selenium , Rest API testing . Prior experience in handling a team as well
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Hands on years of experience into Design and implement automated tests for web and mobile applications using
 **Selenium and BDD frameworks** 
 .
* Create and maintain test automation frameworks for web, mobile, and API projects.
* Experience in
 **API Testing \\& API Automation \\& Good knowledge of Postman / RestAssured** 
 /
 **karate** 
 (any one the rest can be trained if not available)
* Expected to be proficient in one of the test BDD frameworks Cucumber.
* Good knowledge of Git, Jenkins knowledge
* Experience in enhancing \\& developing of API/Web Service automation framework.
* Write and maintain detailed test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
* Experience with Atlassian s Jira \\& any Test management tools
* Execute test cases and report defects in a timely manner.
* Experience in estimating, prioritizing, planning, and coordinating testing activities
* Strong ability to perform functional integration testing of all integration points between the applications, components, and services
* Perform end\\-to\\-end manual testing where features and user stories are tested in their entirety
* Identify and track defects, and work with the development team to resolve them.
* Integrate test suites into the test management system and custom test harnesses.
* Collaborate with the development team to ensure that the product meets the requirements and is of high quality.
* Participate in product demos and release reviews.
* Continuously improve testing processes and methodologies.
* Stay current with new testing tools and technologies.







**Requirements \\& Skills** 




**Must\\-have:** 



* **Functional Requirement Gathering: Min 8 years**
* **Selenium BDD Automation: Min 8\\+ years**
* **Cucumber: Min 4\\+ years**
* **Core Java: Min 6 \\+Years**
* **API automation: Min 4 years (Karate, rest assured)**
* **GIT: Min 1 year**



**Other\\-skills:** 



* **Automation Framework Implementation: Min 5 year**
* Gradle/maven: Min 5 years
* **Jenkins: Min 4 years**
* Postman: Min 2 years
* Database Testing: 2 Years



**Nice to have:** 



* Mobile Automation (Appium, Calabash..etc): Min 2 years
* Karate API Framework Knowledge
* Experience in Splunk: Min 1 year
